zones.description: The availability zones of the cluster.

identity.description: The identity of the cluster, if configured.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

capacity.description: The number of instances of the cluster.

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the Kusto cluster. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

provisioningState.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

stateReason.description: The reason for the cluster's current state.

enableDiskEncryption.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

enableStreamingIngest.description: A boolean value that indicates if the streaming ingest is enabled.

keyVaultProperties.description: KeyVault properties for the cluster encryption.

version.description: The version of the template defined, for instance 1.

isEnabled.description: A boolean value that indicate if the optimized autoscale feature is enabled or not.

enginePublicIpId.description: Engine service's public IP address resource id.

dataManagementPublicIpId.description: Data management's service public IP address resource id.

keyName.description: The name of the key vault key.

keyVersion.description: The version of the key vault key.

keyVaultUri.description: The Uri of the key vault.

principalId.description: The principal ID assigned to the cluster principal. It can be a user email, application ID, or security group name.

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the principal

tenantName.description: The tenant name of the principal

provisioningState.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

softDeletePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept before it stops being accessible to queries in TimeSpan.

hotCachePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept in cache for fast queries in TimeSpan.

leaderClusterResourceId.description: The name of the leader cluster

attachedDatabaseConfigurationName.description: The name of the attached database configuration cluster

principalsModificationKind.description: The principals modification kind of the database

size.description: The database size - the total size of compressed data and index in bytes.

softDeletePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept before it stops being accessible to queries in TimeSpan.

hotCachePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept in cache for fast queries in TimeSpan.

isFollowed.description: Indicates whether the database is followed.

databaseName.description: The name of the database which you would like to attach, use * if you want to follow all current and future databases.

clusterResourceId.description: The resource id of the cluster where the databases you would like to attach reside.

attachedDatabaseNames.description: The list of databases from the clusterResourceId which are currently attached to the cluster.

properties.description: The properties of the Event Grid data connection.

kind.description: Kind of the endpoint for the data connection

storageAccountResourceId.description: The resource ID of the storage account where the data resides.

eventHubResourceId.description: The resource ID where the event grid is configured to send events.

tableName.description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

mappingRuleName.description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

dataFormat.description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

compression.description: The event hub messages compression type

findings.description: The list of network connectivity diagnostic finding

nameAvailable.description: Specifies a Boolean value that indicates if the name is available.

message.description: Message indicating an unavailable name due to a conflict, or a description of the naming rules that are violated.

reason.description: Message providing the reason why the given name is invalid.
